dict.acceptation: 伤害，损害；受伤处；伤害的行为；

sent.orig: Background: Hepatic ischemia reperfusion (HIR) injury is a common acute disease of surgery.
sent.trans: 肝脏缺血再灌注损伤(Hepatic ischemia reperfusion injury,HIR)是指肝脏缺血后重获血流灌注或氧供后，肝脏损伤会在缺血缺氧损伤的基础上进一步加重。

sent.orig: In between the wandering and despair of pardon, the only feeling is that injury injury injury!
sent.trans: 在原谅与绝望之间游荡，唯一的感觉是伤伤伤！

sent.orig: After injury, articular cartilage has limited self-repair ability. The injury tissue cannot form normal hyaline cartilage.
sent.trans: 关节软骨损伤后自我修复能力有限，不能形成正常透明软骨。

sent.orig: Conclusion: Traumatic gastric rupture is offen caused by abdominal open injury and has associated injury.
sent.trans: 结论：外伤性胃破裂多见于腹部开放性损伤，常有合并伤。

sent.orig: Rather than rehabilitating after an injury, a pitcher can prevent that injury with sound mechanics.
sent.trans: 投球手与其在受伤之后复原，不如以正确的技巧来避免伤害。
